import React, {useState} from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form'; import { yupResolver } from '@hookform/resolvers'; import {Input, Label, Button, FormGroup} from 'reactstrap' import * as yup from "yup"; import HeavyEquipForm from './style.js' /* 라우터 주소 테스트용 컴포넌트 * 인자 설명 */ const HeavyEquipRegister = () => { const [type, setType] = useState('equip'); const [useyn, setUseyn] = useState('Y'); const [code, setCode] = useState(''); const [construction, setConstruction] = useState('phochen'); const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [modelname, setModelName] = useState(''); const [carnumber, setCarNumber] = useState(''); const [caridentify, setCarIdentify] = useState(''); const [manufacturer, setManufacturer] = useState(''); const [caryear, setCarYear] = useState(''); const [buydate, setBuyDate] = useState(''); const [uptime, setUptime] = useState(''); const schema = yup.object().shape({ code: yup.string().required(), name: yup.string().required(), model_name: yup.string().required(), car_number: yup.string().required(), car_identify: yup.string().required(), manufacturer: yup.string(), car_year: yup.number(), uptime: yup.number() }); const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm({ resolver: yupResolver(schema), defaultValues: { type: 'equip', useyn: 'Y', construction: 'phochen' } }); const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log(errors); console.log(data); }; return (
장비 관리
장비/차량
사용여부
관리코드 {errors.code &&

{errors.name.code}

} 		시공현장
장비명 {errors.name &&

{errors.name.message}

} 		모델명 {errors.model_name &&

{errors.model_name.message}

}
등록번호 {errors.car_number &&

{errors.car_number.message}

} 		차대번호 {errors.car_identify &&

{errors.car_identify.message}

}
제조사 {errors.manufacturer &&

{errors.manufacturer.message}

} 		연식 {errors.car_year &&

{errors.car_year.message}

}
구입일 {errors.buy_date &&

{errors.buy_date.message}

} 		구입가동시간 {errors.uptime &&

{errors.uptime.message}

}
) } export default React.memo(HeavyEquipRegister)
